channel.title: Comments on: HP working on micro-finance
channel.description: I am multiple and various - Tomas A. Krag

item.title: By: rachel
item.dc:creator: rachel
item.description: i'd like to discuss this idea of yours in more detail. i am currently a professional working in the field of microfinance and am interested in understanding more about the software application opportunities within this space.
item.content:encoded: i’d like to discuss this idea of yours in more detail. i am currently a professional working in the field of microfinance and am interested in understanding more about the software application opportunities within this space.

item.title: By: Tapan
item.dc:creator: Tapan
item.description: I suggest you guys take a look at the MOAP project, http://moap.sourceforge.net./ We are looking at this problem, and always looking for more people to join in...
item.content:encoded: I suggest you guys take a look at the MOAP project, http://moap.sourceforge.net/. We are looking at this problem, and always looking for more people to join in…
